It's very easy to learn more about Marfan Syndrome!

#Marfan

Thank you for your amazing support!

#Marfan

Large pneumothoraces are likely to be medical emergencies requiring emergency decompression.

#Marfan

Clinical trials are under way for promising new treatments.

#Marfan

With your continued support, we can continue to help save lives.

#Marfan

Early onset glaucoma can be another related problem with Marfan Syndrome.

#Marfan

Sometimes eye problems appear only after the weakening of connective tissue has caused detachment of the retina.

#Marfan

Nearsightedness and astigmatism are common, but farsightedness can also result.

#Marfan

Abnormal curvature of the spine, abnormal indentation or protrusion of the sternum are not uncommon.

#Marfan

An individual's arms may be disproportionately long, with thin, weak wrists.

#Marfan

Marfan Syndrome may affect the lungs, the eyes, the dural sac surrounding the spinal cord, the skeleton and the hard palate.

#Marfan

Saving lives begins with Education and Awareness.

#Marfan

More than 30 different signs and symptoms are variably associated with Marfan Syndrome.

#Marfan
RT @FCMichigan: 12 Resources for #Marfan Syndrome Awareness Month http://t.co/x3tHMIQfv4

Care should be taken to attempt repair of damaged heart valves rather than replacement.

#Marfan

Marfan Syndrome can seriously affect the eyes and vision.

#Marfan

#Marfan 

Most of the readily visible signs of Marfan Syndrome are associated with the skeletal system.

Regular checkups by a cardiologist are needed to monitor the health of the heart valves and the aorta.

#Marfan

Cold arms, hands and feet can be linked to Marfan Syndrome, because of inadequate circulation.

#Marfan

Flo Hyman, an Olympic silver medalist in Women's Volleyball (1984) died suddenly at a match from an aortic dissection.

#Marfan

Jonathan Larson, the author and composer of Rent, died from an aortic dissection the day before the off-Broadway opening of Rent.

#Marfan

Some people with Marfan Syndrome have speech disorders resulting from symptomatic high palates and small jaws.

#Marfan

RT @MarfanSyndrome1: Some people with Marfan Syndrome have speech disorders resulting from symptomatic high palates and small jaws.

#Marfan

Early osteoarthritis may occur.

#Marfan

Marfan Syndrome is named after Antoine Marfan, the French pediatrician who first described the condition in 1896.

#Marfan

Marfan Syndrome has a range of expressions, from mild to severe.

#Marfan

#Marfan
